directions: Heat a medium soup pot over moderate heat. Add oil, shallots and garlic. Sauté 5 minutes. Add drained tomatoes and crushed tomatoes, stir. Add stock and stir to combine soup. Stir in spinach in handfuls to wilt it and combine with soup. Season soup with salt and pepper to your taste. Bring soup to a bubble, reduce heat and simmer 10 to 15 minutes to reduce.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons evoo, extra-virgin olive oil, 2 turns of the pan
1 (28-ounce) can diced tomatoes in juice, drained
2 cups good quality vegetable stock, available in soup aisle
1/2 ten-ounce sack triple washed spinach, stems removed and spinach shredded with knife
Salt and pepper to your taste
title: Tomato and Spinach Soup
